definitions.body: :Le 25:45 sojourner, only P (H) and late; abs. ´[[ת]] Ge 23:4 + 6 t; cstr. [[תּוֹשַׁב]] Le 22:10; sf. [[תּוֹשָֽׁבְְ]] Le 25:6; pl. [[תּוֹשָׁבִים]] v:Le 25:6 + 2 t.; cstr. [[תּשָׁבֵי]] 1Ki 17:1, but read [[חִשְׁבֶּה]] (q.v.) LXX Ew Th Hi;—sojourner, appar. of a more temporaty and dependent (Lv Le 22:10, Le 25:6) kind than the [[גֵּר]] (with which it is often joined): ‖[[שָׂכִיר]] Ex 12:45 (P), Le 22:10 ([[כּׂהֵן]] ´[[ת]] apriest's sojourner), Le 25:6, Le 25:40 (all H); [[הַחשְָׁבִים הַגָּרִים עִמָּכֶם]] v:Le 25:45 (c. pt. [[גָּד]] also v:Le 25:6); c. [[עִם]], also Le 25:47, Le 25:47 (H); c. [[בְּחוֹךְ]] Nu 35:15 (P). Fig. of one enjoying only a temporary tenure, c. [[עִם]] Ge 23:4, with ´[[י]] Le 25:23, Ps 39:13, c. [[לִפְנֵי]] 1Ch 29:15.—1Ki 17:1 v. supr.
